org.whiteflag.protocol.core

Class WfMessageField

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.whiteflag.protocol.core.WfMessageField

  • public class WfMessageField
extends java.lang.Object
    Whiteflag generic message field class

    This is a class defining a generic Whiteflag message field. Instances of this class represent specific fields in specific message types with a number of defined properties: name, allowed values, encoding, starting byte and ending byte.

        name - the name of the Whiteflag field
        pattern - a string with the regex pattern defining allowed values
        encoding - the @{WfMessageField.Encoding} of the field
